Card.Name: Chaplain of Alms // Chapel Shieldgeist
Card.Type: Creature — Human Cleric // Creature — Spirit Cleric

Card.Name: Lunarch Veteran
Card.Type: Creature — Human Cleric // Creature — Spirit Cleric

Card.Name: Delver of Secrets
Card.Type: Creature — Human Wizard // Creature — Human Insect

Card.Name: Malevolent Hermit
Card.Type: Creature — Human Wizard // Creature — Spirit Wizard

Card.Name: Dennick, Pious Apprentice
Card.Type: Legendary Creature — Human Soldier // Legendary Creature — Spirit Soldier

Card.Name: Mantis Rider
Card.RulesText: Flying, vigilance, haste

Card.Name: Archon of Emeria
Card.RulesText: Flying Each player can't cast more than one spell each turn. Nonbasic lands your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

Card.Name: Lier, Disciple of the Drowned
Card.RulesText: Spells can't be countered. Each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard has flashback. The flashback cost is equal to that card's mana cost.

Card.Name: Fading Hope
Card.RulesText: Return target creature to its owner's hand. If its mana value was 3 or less, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

Card.Name: Consider
Card.RulesText: Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.) Draw a card.

Card.Name: Play with Fire
Card.RulesText: Play with Fire deals 2 damage to any target. If a player is dealt damage this way, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

Card.Name: Shock
Card.RulesText: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

Card.Name: Banefire
Card.RulesText: Banefire deals X damage to any target. If X is 5 or more, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.

Card.Name: Cinderclasm
Card.RulesText: Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.) Cinderclasm deals 1 damage to each creature. If it was kicked, it deals 2 damage to each creature instead.

Card.Name: Dovin's Veto
Card.RulesText: This spell can't be countered. Counter target noncreature spell.

Card.Name: Faithful Mending
Card.RulesText: You gain 2 life, draw two cards, then discard two cards. Flashback {1}{W}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

Card.Name: Favorable Winds
Card.RulesText: Creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.

Card.Name: Ral's Outburst
Card.RulesText: Ral's Outburst deals 3 damage to any target. Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

Card.Name: Starnheim Unleashed
Card.RulesText: Create a 4/4 white Angel Warrior creature token with flying and vigilance. If this spell was foretold, create X of those tokens instead. Foretell {X}{X}{W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

Card.Name: Alrund's Epiphany
Card.RulesText: Create two 1/1 blue Bird creature tokens with flying. Take an extra turn after this one. Exile Alrund's Epiphany. Foretell {4}{U}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

Card.Name: Mystic Monastery
Card.RulesText: Mystic Monastery enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}, {R}, or {W}.

Card.Name: Sacred Foundry
Card.RulesText: ({T}: Add {R} or {W}.) As Sacred Foundry enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

Card.Name: Temple Of Epiphany
Card.RulesText: Temple of Epiphany enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Epiphany enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

Card.Name: Temple Of Triumph
Card.RulesText: Temple of Triumph enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Triumph enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

Card.Name: Hallowed Fountain
Card.RulesText: ({T}: Add {W} or {U}.) As Hallowed Fountain enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
